name: Cookie Runner
description:
This mobile and desktop game is a small arcade game where you have to dodge the double choc cookies and their friends. Your aim is to get as far as you can beating your old highscore without making contact with any of the other cookies. You can stop moving and boost to dodge your cookie socialising time, although dont let the camera over take you!

Controlls (Android and Desktop):

  • Hold space / hold down screen to stop moving
  • Double space / double tap to boost

UI controlls for later jam versions have become more dodgy due to only being allowed the one input (Space bar), this will be fixed in later updates outside of the jam.
